name: Mess in the shed
description:
One of these days, a hole formed in the ceiling of the shed, from which food began to pour! Save your brethren by devouring all that falls from above!

Controllers:

arrow keys - move

Spacebar - jump

P - pause

The game was made for a "Accountability Jam: February 2023", where i wanted to make my first unity game. Hope you'll find it funny!

Credits:

Game engine - Unity

Music - Not Jam on itch.io

Sounds - Freesound.org

Background - painted by my brother

Programming, sprites, idea etc. - by me <3
